New Records: Ireland was bowled out for 96 runs, their second-lowest total in a T20I match
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh dismissed both Irish openers in the third over
Hardik Pandya and Jasprit Bumrah contributed to breaking down the Irish batting order
Ireland collapsed to 96 runs in 16 overs
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and elected to bowl first
The pitch conditions were favorable for fast bowlers
Post-Match Reflections: The outcome was a significant achievement for India's bowling attack
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York
The performance of the Indian seamers was a highlight
